00020 
00021 #include "node.h"
00022 #include "compbar.h"
00023 
00024 #include <vtkLineSource.h>
00025 #include <vtkTubeFilter.h>
00026 #include <vtkActor.h>
00027 #include <vtkPolyDataMapper.h>
00028 #include <vtkProperty.h>
00029 #include <vtkRenderer.h>
00030 
00031 #include <cmath>
00032 
00033 namespace mknix {
00034 
00035 CompBar::CompBar()
00036 {
00037 }
00038 
00039 
00040 CompBar::CompBar(int mat_in, Node * nodeA_in, Node *nodeB_in)
00041   : mat(mat_in)
00042   , nodeA(nodeA_in)
00043   , nodeB(nodeB_in)
00044 {
00045   double length;
00046   length = std::sqrt( std::pow(nodeA->getx()-nodeB->getx(), 2) +
00047                       std::pow(nodeA->gety()-nodeB->gety(), 2) +
00048                       std::pow(nodeA->getz()-nodeB->getz(), 2) );
00049   line = vtkLineSource::New();
00050   line->SetResolution(10);
00051 
00052   lineTubes = vtkTubeFilter::New();
00053   lineTubes->SetInputConnection(line->GetOutputPort());
00054   lineTubes->SetRadius(length/20.);
00055   lineTubes->SetNumberOfSides(8);
00056 
00057   lineMapper = vtkPolyDataMapper::New();
00058   lineMapper->SetInputConnection( lineTubes->GetOutputPort() );
00059 
00060   lineActor = vtkActor::New();
00061   lineActor->SetMapper( lineMapper );
00062   lineActor->GetProperty()->SetColor(0.4235,0.6667,0.000);
00063 
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 CompBar::~CompBar()
00068 {
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 void CompBar::actualizePoints()
00073 {
00074   line->SetPoint1(nodeA->getx(),
00075                    nodeA->gety(),
00076                    nodeA->getz()
00077                   );
00078   line->SetPoint2(nodeB->getx(),
00079                    nodeB->gety(),
00080                    nodeB->getz()
00081                   );
00082 }
00083 
00084 void CompBar::addToRender(vtkRenderer * renderer_in)
00085 {
00086       renderer_in->AddActor( lineActor );
00087 
00088 }
00089 
00090 void CompBar::removeFromRender(vtkRenderer * renderer_in)
00091 {
00092       renderer_in->RemoveActor( lineActor );
00093 }
00094 
00095 }
